item.title: Are Open World Games Bad?
item.description:
Open world games are very common now, but there was a time when the term 'Open World' didn't even exist. More AAA developers are producing open world games, but is that a good thing? Jake is starting to believe that most open world games aren't very good, so he's invited his older brother, Brock onto BitCast for the very first time to discuss. Thanks for tuning in to talk about some stuff! 

-- Visit the site

https://bitbloggist... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/6ec0e888/podcast/rss

item.title: Nerds Assemble 302 - What’s up with Patreon?
item.description: Join Emily, Paul and Paul as they discuss what they’ve been up to plus discuss what’s going on with Patreon, the GTA 6 leak and the upcoming PlayStation VR 2. Up for discussion:Three Thousand Years of LongingShe-Hulk season 1 Lower Decks season 3Rick and Morty season 6House of the Dragon season 1Rings of Power season 1The Sandman season 1Elden RingShin Megami Tensei VThe Lazarus Heist by Geoff WhiteSteamdeck So, are you sitting comfortably? Click here to listen in your browser... Feed: https://feeds.feedburner.com/nerdsassemble
